thread.title: BRIEF-Orbital ATK Signs Cooperative Agreement With U.S. Air Force Space And Missile Systems Center

title: BRIEF-Orbital ATK Signs Cooperative Agreement With U.S. Air Force Space And Missile Systems Center

organizations.name: atk signs cooperative agreement with u.s. air force

text:
22 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Orbital ATK Signs Cooperative Agreement With U.S. Air Force Space And Missile Systems Center Reuters Staff 
Jan 4 (Reuters) - Orbital Atk Inc: 
* ORBITAL ATK SIGNS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT WITH U.S. AIR FORCE SPACE AND MISSILE SYSTEMS CENTER 
* ORBITAL ATK - AGREEMENT PROVIDES PLAN FOR DATA EXCHANGES NEEDED TO CERTIFY CO‘S NGL SYSTEM TO CARRY NATIONAL SECURITY SPACE MISSIONS ​ 
* ORBITAL ATK INC - ‍NEXT PHASE OF NGL PROGRAM IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN WHEN AIR FORCE AWARDS LAUNCH SERVICES AGREEMENTS IN MID-2018​ Source text for Eikon:
